name: Pablo's Digimon Season 3 Quiz | TV for Kids | 5 Questions

questions.text: Which Digimon does Renamon digivolve into?
questions.explanation:
Kyubimon.

	Even though Renamon is a girl, she is very powerful.

questions.text: In Digimon Season 3, which Digimon was Renamon talking to?
questions.explanation:
Impmon.

	Even though Impmon is very little, he is a tough Digimon.

Digi-Egg of Knowledge.

	Honeybeemon may look little, but he has a powerful sting.

questions.text: Which Digimon does Growlmon War digivolve to?
questions.explanation:
War Growlmon.

	Growlmon's exhaust flame is his most powerful attack of all.

questions.text: Which Digimon from Season 3 was also in 'Digimon The Movie'?
questions.explanation:
Rapidmon.

	In 'Digimon The Movie', Rapidmon helped Magnamon destroy the virus in Kokomon.
